titleStmt.title: The third part of the reports of severall excellent cases of law, argued and adjudged in the courts of law at Westminster in the time of the late Queen Elizabeth, from the first, to the five and thirtieth year of her reign collected by a learned professor of the law, William Leonard ... ; with alphabetical tables of the names of the cases, and of the matters contained in the book.
Reports and cases of law argued and adjudged in the courts at Westminster. Part 3
titleStmt.author: Leonard, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of Richard and Edward Atkins ... for Henry Twyford, Thomas Basset, William Rawlins and John Place,

notesStmt.note: "Not before imprinted; and now published by William Hughes of Grays-Inn, Esq."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
